mapper.sql: id, account_id accountId, account_name accountName, user_name userName, merchant_id merchantId, custom_id customId, alias, type, yn, sys_version sysVersion, create_pin createPin, create_date createDate, update_pin updatePin, update_date updateDate
mapper.insert: insert into fms_merchantmaster_jd_wallet (id, account_id, account_name, user_name, merchant_id, custom_id, alias, type, yn, sys_version, create_pin, create_date, update_pin, update_date ) values (#{id}, #{accountId}, #{accountName}, #{userName}, #{merchantId}, #{customId}, #{alias}, #{type}, #{yn}, #{sysVersion}, #{createPin}, #{createDate}, #{updatePin}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: update fms_merchantmaster_jd_wallet set account_id = #{accountId}, account_name = #{accountName}, user_name = #{userName}, merchant_id = #{merchantId}, custom_id = #{customId}, alias = #{alias}, type = #{type}, yn = #{yn}, sys_version = #{sysVersion}, create_pin = #{createPin}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_pin = #{updatePin}, update_date = #{updateDate} where id = #{id}
